title.rendered: Can Psilocybin or “Magic Mushrooms” Be Used to Treat Depression?

<title>Can Psilocybin or "Magic Mushrooms" be Used to Treat Depression?</title>
<meta name="description" content="Psilocybin or "magic mushrooms" have received increased attention as a potential treatment for depression, but it's important to understand the risks and research." />

itemListElement.name: Can Psilocybin or “Magic Mushrooms” Be Used to Treat Depression?

@graph.name: Chloe Sernasie
@graph.description: Chloe’s passion for mental health promotion began in high school, and led her to pursue a degree in psychology at the University of British Columbia, where she became involved in research related to mental health. Since graduating, Chloe has continued advocating for mental wellness through employment with the Canadian Mental Health Association as a community support worker, and through volunteering with the Anxiety Canada Youth Network. Chloe understands that men face unique challenges navigating the mental health care system, and worked to alleviate some of the burden through her work with HeadsUpGuys. As former HeadsUpGuys' Directory Coordinator, she contributed to several articles while managing our Therapist Directory.
